https://tmrev.io/movie/156314-A.K.A. Serial Killer 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wqxEvqCDIBfGhiueFn8WEFl7XXo.jpg AKA Serial Killer documents the social upheaval and political oppression that roiled Japan in the 1960s, profiling a nineteen-year-old serial killer Norio Nagayama. An indictment of media sensationalism, the film humanizes the young man by situating his crimes in the larger context of his environment. A.K.A. Serial Killer
